@@ -316,17 +316,37 @@
    .hero-section-fullpage {
      position: relative;
-     width: 100%;
+     width: 100vw;
      height: 100vh;
      min-height: 100vh;
      overflow: hidden;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0a0a0a 0%, #1a1a1a 100%);
+     margin-left: calc(-280px - 3rem);
+     margin-right: calc(-100vw + 100%);
+   }
+ 
+   @media (max-width: 1024px) {
+     .hero-section-fullpage {
+       margin-left: calc(-260px - 2rem);
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   @media (max-width: 768px) {
+     .hero-section-fullpage {
+       width: 100% !important;
+       margin-left: 0 !important;
+       margin-right: 0 !important;
+     }
    }
  
    /* Content Overlay */
    .hero-content-overlay {
-     position: relative;
+     position: absolute;
+     top: 0;
+     left: 0;
+     right: 0;
+     bottom: 0;
      z-index: 50;
      width: 100%;
-     height: 100vh;
+     height: 100%;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;

---


## Changes Made:

1. **Full-screen width**: Changed `.hero-section-fullpage` from `width: 100%` to `width: 100vw` to span the full viewport width.
2. **Container breakout**: Added `margin-left: calc(-280px - 3rem)` and `margin-right: calc(-100vw + 100%)` to break out of the container, matching the home and kiosks pages.
3. **Overlay positioning**: Changed `.hero-content-overlay` from `position: relative` to `position: absolute` with proper top/left/right/bottom positioning to overlay the background correctly.
4. **Responsive breakpoints**: Added media queries for 1024px and 768px to adjust margins appropriately on different screen sizes.
5. **Content centering**: Added width adjustments for larger screens to ensure the content is properly centered when the sidebar is hidden.

The contact page hero section should now display as a full-screen hero matching the home and kiosks pages. The hero spans the full viewport width and height, breaking out of the container while maintaining proper responsive behavior on mobile devices.

---
